'''Bahar''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in the Event [[A Parade of Providence]]. She can be found below the [[Razan Garden]].

During this period, Farbal can be found under [[File:Icon In Truths Steps.png|30x30px]] icon on the map.
